name: Plague Pit
description: A mass grave for victims of disease; adventurers might investigate outbreaks, search for lost relics, or encounter restless spirits.
atmosphere: The pit has a grim, haunted atmosphere with the scent of decay and the weight of mass death hanging in the air. The sound of restless spirits and the cold presence of the dead creates a malevolent, supernatural mood. The atmosphere crackles with the tension of disease and death and the constant threat of supernatural retribution.
